title: Historic Downtown
description: Explore charming shops, local cafes, and historic architecture.

title: Riverwalk Park
description: Perfect for picnics and scenic sunset walks along the river.

title: City Art Museum
description: A collection of contemporary and classical art exhibits.

title: Botanical Gardens
description: Lush gardens showcasing native and exotic plant species.

title: Science Discovery Center
description: Hands‑on exhibits for kids and curious adults alike.

title: Historic Theater
description: Restored 1920s theater hosting live performances and films.

title: Riverfront Market
description: Open‑air market with local produce, crafts, and street food.

title: City Aquarium
description: Marine exhibits and educational programs for all ages.
